title: How to Create a Gravatar

steps.headline: Visit the Gravatar website to sign up.
Click on the "Create Your Own Gravatar" button.
Sign up for Gravatar with a WordPress.com account.
steps.description: Or click Already have a WordPress.com account? to sign in.

steps.headline: Click on the link in the confirmation email.
steps.description: Check your spam folder if you don't see an email from WordPress.com.

steps.headline: Go back to Gravatar and log in if necessary.
Click the "Add a new image" button.
Click "Choose File" and pick a profile picture from your computer.
Crop your image by moving the box that is overlaid on the image you choose.

text:
Visit the Gravatar website to sign up. It's located at https://gravatar.com. Click on the "Create Your Own Gravatar" button. Sign up for Gravatar with a WordPress.com account. Or click Already have a WordPress.com account? to sign in. Click on the link in the confirmation email. Check your spam folder if you don't see an email from WordPress.com. Go back to Gravatar and log in if necessary. Click the "Add a new image" button. Click the "Upload new" button. Click "Choose File" and pick a profile picture from your computer. Then click "Next". Crop your image by moving the box that is overlaid on the image you choose.
